reportJson.addressLine: H.no.11-192, S.No.31-2,  Kakkalapalle village, Anantapur(1221), Anantapur Rural Mandal, Anantapur District, Andhra Pradesh

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No.991 of 2026, dated 27/Jan/2026, executed by Sake Narasimhulu in favour of his wife, Sake Anusha, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 52.01 Sq.Yds., (or) 468.09 Sq.Ft., bearing house number 11-192, comprised in survey number 31-2, Assessment No.5040, situated in Kakkalapalle colony Panchayat area, Anantapur Mandal, within the District of Anantapur registered at sub-registrar office Anantapur(1221) is bounded as follows: North by: Road South by: House of Narasimha East by: House of Ramu West by: House of Ravi

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in comprised in survey number 31-2, bearing house number 11-192,Assessment No.5040 situated in Kakkalapalle colony Panchayat area measuring about 52.01 Sq.Yds., (or) 468.09 Sq.Ft., was originally owned by Sake Narasimhulu. 2.The aforementioned, Sake Narasimhulu executed Gift Settlement Deed on 27/Jan/2026, registered as document No.991 of 2026, before the SRO Anantapur(1221) in favour of his wife, Sake Anusha towards the property measuring an extent 52.01 Sq.Yds., (or) 468.09 Sq.Ft., bearing house no.11-192, comprised in survey number 31-2, Assessment No.5040, situated in Kakkalapalle colony Panchayat area. It is noted that online verification of the Encumbrance Certificate (EC) could not be carried out as the government website is currently non-operational. Consequently, verification of any existing active mortgage or lease deed could not be completed. Hence, F.I. is required to verify the EC prior to loan disbursement. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : Note: It is noted that the HTR was not attached in this case. When the same was enquired with the F.I., they responded that to release a conditional report. Therefore, it is advisable to obtain possession certificate for 13 years before proceeding with the loan disbursement.
The Mutation Proceedings were not concluded in the name of current owner, Sake Anusha

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Sake Anusha, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 52.01 Sq.Yds., (or) 468.09 Sq.Ft., bearing house number 11-192, comprised in survey number 31-2, Assessment No.5040, situated in Kakkalapalle colony Panchayat area, Anantapur Mandal, within the District of  Anantapur  registered at sub-registrar office Anantapur(1221)
